ing: 3 red bell peppers, seeded and coarsely chopped
3 green bell peppers, seeded and coarsely chopped
des: "This is a paste I use mostly for making Spanish rice, but you may find other dishes to use it in as well. Store in the refrigerator."
ins: Blend onions, red bell peppers, green bell peppers, cilantro, and garlic in a blender, in batches if necessary, into a smooth paste.
